text: Poklonyaytes聞 Allahu ta ne dodavayte Yomu nikoho yak rivnoho. Yaknaykrashche stavtesya do bat聞kiv, rodychiv, syrit i bidnykh; a takozh do susidiv, yaki ye vashymy rodychamy, i do tykh, yaki ne ye vashymy rodychamy; do pobratyma, do podorozhn聞oho, a takozh do rabiv vashykh. Voistynu, Allah ne lyubyt聞 zukhvalykh i hordykh
